text: Basanthpur Narayan Rao (1 July 1955 – 24 September 2020) was an Indian politician who was a member of the Karnataka Legislative Assembly from Basavakalyan for the for the Indian National Congress from 2018 until his death. He had competed in the elections to become an MLA twice before winning a seat. Rao was born on 1 July 1955 in the village of Basanthpur, Bidar district. He was admitted to a private hospital in Manipal on 1 September 2020, suffering from COVID-19. Rao died from the disease on 24 September, aged 65. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in India Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Karnataka Category:Members of the Karnataka Legislative Assembly Category:People from Bidar district
title: B. Narayan Rao
